General.Name: Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. research, develops, produces, and markets power operating supplies, UPS/inverter power supplies for electric power and distribution network in China and internationally. The company offers power supply module and supporting monitoring system, DC power supply system, and intelligent AC-DC integrated power supply system. It offers general-purpose modules, component power supplies, intelligent chassis power supplies, and high-power power supplies, etc. Its products are used in missile-borne, vehicle-mounted, radar, ship, airborne, railway, ground systems, and other fields. Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.
